categories.name: beginner
categories.description: Simple and low-impact exercises for those starting their fitness journey.

categories.name: intermediate
categories.description: Moderate-intensity exercises for building endurance, strength, and balance.

categories.name: hard
categories.description: High-intensity, advanced workouts designed for experienced individuals.

exercises.title: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.description: A great lower-body movement that strengthens your legs and glutes.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Bend your knees and push your hips back as if sitting on a chair.
Keep your chest up and your knees behind your toes.
Push through your heels to return to standing position.

exercises.title: Knee Push-Ups
exercises.description: A gentler version of the classic push-up, perfect for building upper body strength.
instructions: Start in a plank position on your knees.
Keep your hands under your shoulders and your core tight.
Lower your chest toward the floor, then push back up.

exercises.title: Glute Bridge
exercises.description: A simple yet powerful move to activate your glutes and hamstrings.
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Lift your hips by pressing through your heels.
Squeeze your glutes at the top, then slowly lower down.

exercises.title: Plank Hold
exercises.description: An excellent core stabilization exercise for beginners.
instructions: Place your forearms on the floor and extend your legs back.
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Engage your core and hold the position for 20–30 seconds.

exercises.title: Wall Sit
exercises.description: A static exercise that strengthens your lower body without movement.
instructions: Stand with your back against a wall.
Slide down until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Hold the position for 30–45 seconds.

exercises.title: Standard Push-Ups
exercises.description: A bodyweight move targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps.
instructions: Start in a high plank position with hands under shoulders.
Lower your chest until it's just above the floor.
Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.title: Lunges
exercises.description: A dynamic lower-body exercise that works the legs and core.
instructions: Stand upright and step one leg forward.
Lower your body until both knees are bent at 90 degrees.
Push back up and switch legs.

exercises.title: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: A fast-paced move that improves cardiovascular endurance and core strength.
instructions: Start in a plank position.
Alternate driving your knees toward your chest in a running motion.
Maintain a steady pace for 30–60 seconds.

exercises.title: Jump Squats
exercises.description: An explosive version of squats that adds intensity and power.
instructions: Perform a regular squat, then jump explosively upward.
Land softly and immediately go into the next rep.

exercises.title: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: A great exercise to tone and strengthen your arms using your bodyweight.
instructions: Sit on the edge of a sturdy surface (chair or bench).
Place hands beside your hips and slide forward.
Lower your body until your elbows are at 90°, then push up.

exercises.title: Side Plank
exercises.description: Targets obliques and improves balance and core strength.
instructions: Lie on one side, supporting your body with one forearm.
Lift your hips so your body forms a straight line.
Hold for 20–40 seconds, then switch sides.

exercises.title: Burpees
exercises.description: A high-intensity full-body exercise for strength and endurance.
instructions: Start standing, then drop into a squat position.
Place hands on the floor and kick your feet back into a push-up position.
Perform a push-up, jump your feet back, then explode upward.

exercises.title: Pull-Ups
exercises.description: An upper-body powerhouse move targeting your back and arms.
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip.
Pull yourself up until your chin clears the bar.
Lower slowly and repeat.

exercises.title: Pistol Squats
exercises.description: A challenging single-leg squat for strength and balance.
instructions: Stand on one leg and extend the other forward.
Slowly lower into a squat while keeping balance.
Push through your heel to stand up.

exercises.title: Handstand Hold
exercises.description: An advanced move to develop shoulder and core control.
instructions: Kick up into a handstand against a wall.
Engage your core and keep your body straight.
Hold for 15–30 seconds.

exercises.title: Box Jumps
exercises.description: An explosive plyometric move for building leg power.
instructions: Stand facing a sturdy box or platform.
Jump onto it using both feet, landing softly.
Step back down and repeat.

exercises.title: Plank to Push-Up
exercises.description: Combines core stability and upper body strength in one fluid movement.
instructions: Start in a forearm plank position.
Push up onto your hands one at a time into a high plank.
Lower back down to forearms, alternating lead arm.

exercises.title: Jump Lunges
exercises.description: A power-based variation of lunges to boost intensity.
instructions: Start in a lunge position.
Jump explosively, switching legs mid-air.
Land softly and repeat for 10–15 reps per side.

exercises.title: Spiderman Push-Ups
exercises.description: An advanced push-up variation that engages your core and obliques.
instructions: Start in a push-up position.
As you lower, bring your right knee toward your right elbow.
Return and switch sides with each rep.

exercises.title: Plank Jacks
exercises.description: A dynamic plank variation for cardio and core engagement.
instructions: Start in a plank position.
Jump your feet out wide, then back together (like a jumping jack).
Keep your hips level throughout.
